body.name: LEGO Classic Creative Suitcase 10713 - Includes Sorting Storage Organizer Case with Fun Colorful Building Bricks, Preschool Learning Toy for Kids, Boys and Girls Ages 4 Years Old and Up
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 20 hrs 44 mins
features: Compatible with All Sets - LEGO Classic toy building sets are compatible with all LEGO construction sets, making this a great addition to preschool and elementary school classrooms for sparking creativity and learning

Fosters Open-Ended Creativity - This LEGO Classic creative tool set for kids encourages open-ended creativity and imagination, making it an ideal starter set for budding LEGO builders aged 4 years and older
Additional Resources Online - Access extra building instructions, fun videos, ideas, and inspiration to further enhance your child's LEGO building experience

Sturdy Yellow Suitcase - This LEGO Classic toy set features a durable yellow suitcase with convenient sorting compartments, perfect for organizing and storing building bricks, shapes, wheels, and eyes
Suitcase Dimensions & Pieces - Measuring 10" (26cm) high, 11" (28cm) wide, and 2" (6cm) deep, this suitcase contains 213 LEGO pieces, providing endless building possibilities for boys and girls
Creative Building On-the-Go - Children can easily organize their LEGO building bricks and take them anywhere for imaginative building and travel-friendly creative play
body.description: Builders as young as 4 can create, play and pack away! This smart and convenient LEGO Classic 10713 Creative Suitcase, features a selection of brightly colored LEGO building bricks, eyes, wheels and shapes for building all kinds of houses, vehicles, creatures and creations. Inside the yellow case there are multiple compartments where fans can organize and store LEGO pieces. This set also includes simple, age-appropriate building instructions that will help children discover their own creative building skills. Suitcase measures over 10” (26cm) high, 11” (28cm) wide and 2” (6cm) deep. Contains 213 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 4 and 99. This is a great set for play at home and to travel with the suitcase that lets you take your LEGO bricks on the go. In addition, this is a great starter set for preschool and elementary school classrooms who want a toy that sparks creativity as well as learning.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A perfect starter set for budding LEGO builders! A LEGO Classic building set full of open-ended creativity.
Let creativity grow with this LEGO Classic set!

LEGO Classic Creative Suitcase Sort ‘em! Open the robust yellow suitcase to access the bricks inside. Get building! Build cute creatures, cool cars, and anything else they imagine! Bring your bricks! Keep your LEGO bricks and pieces organized at home or on the go.
Age-appropriate building instructions are included! Instructions feature easy-to-follow steps for building fun models.
Colorful bricks included! Comes with a colorful selection of bricks, eyes, wheels, and shapes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Starter Set as a Segway from Duplos to Legos!
reviews.reviewText: Excellent Starter Set! This was a gift for a 4 year old that is new to Lego building! She has had Duplos, but she is more than ready to begin her Lego collection! I have used it as a gift before, so I knew it was tried and true! All kids love the carry case! Easy to take to Grandma's house or traveling! Nice way to keep your Lego bricks stored as well. We use it for other purposes, such as sorting by colors and counting bricks. Easy way to add a lesson or two into your day!For under $20, this is an excellent gift with over 200 pieces, detailed instruction manual and nice carrying case. Years ago, Lego did make a carry case with a base plate built in. That would be an excellent addition to this case, but the typical baseplate will not fit without cutting it down and gluing it inside. Yes, I have done that with other cases! So to make this a perfect gift, I sent it along with a Lego baseplate and the Lego 4+ Vet set so that she had a figure and a vehicle!It was nice to see her 4 year old imagination at work, but even better, it was awesome to watch the bond grow between grandparent and grandchild. What a special time they had together after the party. Lego building has now become part of their routine and their special time!It always makes me feel good when I can mold the future of a little one. I know what Legos have done for my own children and even myself. As an adult builder, it's fun no matter what set you build. Freestyle build or a set. The choice is yours. This can be either.As always, Lego brand is trusted for safety and quality. They can be handed down for many years and are a timeless classic.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just in time for Christmas!
reviews.reviewText: I love the little carrying case and the flexibility to create whatever you want. Good value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great starter lego set!
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this as a gift for a 3 & 5 year Olds and they loved it! They play with this item at least every other day - pulling them away from the phone, tablet, and TV!!!I had someone with a criquet add the names of the children onto the box! The kids thought it was a personal gift designed by the lego store just for them!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My 4 year old brother loves them!
reviews.reviewText: I bought these as a Christmas gift for my 4 year old brother as he recently got into legos and building things and he loves them! All the different colors and types of pieces allow him to have fun experimenting and building using his imagination instead of having to follow instructions for a mode set. The plastic suitcase is great as well as he has somewhere to store them, the only thing that would make that better is if it had better compartments to store the pieces in that way when it’s closing they don’t fall out or get stuck in the cracks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lego set that allows you to make what you want
reviews.reviewText: Nice classic set of Lego blocks. No movie or super hero build, just plain old imagination. That being said they do work with other builds and block to dollar are a great value.
